meanings.definition: A metal grate for broiling food over a fire or in a stove.
meanings.sent1: We used the gridirons to cook burgers over the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The chef placed the steaks on the gridirons to sear them.
meanings.sent3: The gridirons sizzled as the sausages danced on top.
meanings.sent4: The gridirons transformed the raw meat into delicious meals.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the barbecue filled the air as the food sizzled on the gridirons.
